Crazy8

Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • Crazy8.Card

  • public class Card
extends Object
    The Card class holds information on a card's name, it's suit, value. It also includes methods to print and compare.

        public String shortText

        Returns:

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(Card other)
        Provide a method that allows us to compare to cards. Card order is determined firstly by suit in this fashion: Diamonds > Hearts > Spades > Clubs If the suit of two cards is the same, then compare their value. e.g. A 2 of Diamonds is greater than an Ace of Spaces A 9 of Diamonds is less than a King of Diamonds A Queen of Hearts is greater than a Queen of Clubs. A card not of the four cardinal suits is ALWAYS considered less than a card form these suits.
        Parameters:
        other - The other card to compare this card to.
        Returns:
        -1, 0, 1 Pending if this card are less than, equal to, or greater than the other.
